text: "G'day G'day" is a song by Australian country singer Slim Dusty. The song was released in August 1988 as the lead single from Dusty's studio album of the same name. The song peaked at number 37 on the ARIA Charts. The song has since been covered numerous times on various Australian compilation albums. In 2014, IGA Supermarkets celebrated Australia Day with its new campaign "Say G'day Day" which was supported by the release of a modern version of "G'day G'day". == Track listing == ==Weekly charts== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !align="left"|Charts (1988) ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak position |- |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Edition(s) ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| Catalogue |- | Australia | August 1988 | | Standard | Columbia Records | DO 2130 |- |} == References == Category:Slim Dusty songs Category:1980 songs
title: G'day G'day (song)
